page.title: 18THATCHING IN ESSEX part 2
page.content: An average cottage takes around 6 to 8 weeks to thatch,and would need about{three tons}of{straw.}It would cost about{Â£4000}to rethatch an average cottage,rising to{Â£12,000}for a large roof. There is a thatcher living at Elder Street,Wimbish.He told us that the only way to become a thatcher is to be{apprenticed}to one.The apprenticeship takes four years.The Elder Street thatcher has one apprentice working with him at the moment. There is a lot of work for thatchers these days because Local Authorities have a policy of not allowing anyone to remove their thatch.
